title: SoC Physical Design Engineer, Electrical Analysis
description: • As a member of our physical design team, you will be performing various electrical analyses at the block or chip level, including but not limited to Static/Dynamic IR, EM, Noise and Signal EM. • You will work with the CAD/technology teams for flow bring up and validation. • You will also collaborate with the implementation team during the entire chip design cycle to drive sign-off closure for tape-out. • You will handle schedules and support cross-functional engineering efforts.
key_qualifications: Minimum BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience. Solid background and knowledge of computer architecture and digital system, circuit design, and low power techniques. Hands-on experience with ASIC or AMS physical implementation and analysis flow. Possess scripting skills to automate and debug verification flows for digital VLSI design. Knowledge with industrial EDA backend verification tools like Redhawk, PrimeRail, or Voltus and PrimeTime and Tempus. Past experience with sign-off on successful chip tape-outs will help you succeed on our team. Circuit design background and SPICE experience are a plus.
education_experience: Minimum BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience
